name: FishMinator
description:
Hey you, do you think you have what it takes to clean up the water?

If you answered yes, this game is for you. It's a challenging shoot’em up  game where you fight pollution. The majority of your mistakes will be punished. 3 different worlds with unpleasant surroundings. Enemies that can be identified by everyday things discovered in the water on a day to day basis. 

Features:

  • Free Movement across the screen
  • Graphics inspired by NES
  • 3 different worlds to fight in
  • Free Complete Game
  • Shoot-Em-Up
  • Difficult

Developed by solo developer Tomas Gregorcik: https://www.artstation.com/gregorcik

Contact email: Tomasgregorcik30@gmail.com
